title: Studio/ 1BA Apartment- Mountain View
posting_body: ['We Welcome You to Your New Home in Our Friendly Community, at Park Taylor Apartments!', '• Lovely Studio apartment homes featuring gorgeous views in beautiful Mountain View.', '• Conveniently designed homes with open style kitchens, featuring spacious and bright living spaces.', 'HOME FEATURES:', '❄ Air conditioning', '✔ Ceiling fans', '✔ Faux Wood', '✔ Spacious Closet', '✔ Range / Oven', '✔ Garbage Disposal', '✔ Refrigerator', '✔ Cable-ready', 'SPECIAL DETAILS:', '🏡 Bedrooms: Studio', '🛀 Bath: Full Bath', '🚗 Parking:', 'Designated Parking | Street Parking', '✔', 'Laundry: Clean Controlled Access', '✔ Deposit: $800 oac', '✔ Lease Duration: 12 Months', 'COMMUNITY FEATURES:', '✔ Easy to Use Online Portal: Sign Your Lease, Submit Maintenance Requests, Auto-pay', '🛠 24 Hour Emergency Maintenance', '✔ Scenic Park Views', 'MOUNTAIN VIEW SPLENDOR:', '❤ LOVELY Home nestled in a wonderfully friendly community with easy access to schools, shopping, highly rated restaurants, public libraries, community gardens, parks, and transportation.', 'Come home to comfort and convenience at Park Taylor featuring pristine landscaped grounds, gorgeous homes with views overlooking beautiful Whisman Park, and easy parking access under gorgeous towering trees.', 'Love your hiking and biking?', 'Our Lovely surrounding Neighborhoods, and gorgeous trails for hiking and biking are right outside your door, for when your craving being in Nature.', 'Feel like ordering in?', 'Choose from dozens of highly rated, popular, and widely varied restaurants!', "~ Mantra, Zareens, Crepevine, Chef Chu's, Veggie Garden, Garden Fresh, Rincon Sabroso, 5 Guys, Sushi Tomi, Caspian Restaurant, The Sandwich Spot, In N Out, Chipotle and so much more!", 'Included among our neighbors are Google, Netflix, Apple, Nasa, Microsoft, and Stanford University.', 'The Mountain View Transit Center is 1.5 miles where you can easily catch the Caltrain, VTA Light Rail or VTA Buses.', 'A hop skip and a jump away are Whole Foods, Trader Joes, Safeway, Target, Starbucks, Walgreens and CVS.', 'Our dedicated staff will make you feel like you have everything you need, all right here.', '~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~', '~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~ ~', 'Qualifications:', '• Monthly Income Must Be A Minimum of 2.75 Times the Rent.', '• Good credit and Proof of Income.', '• Not a Pet friendly Community', '• Utilities are paid by the tenant', '• See Our Specials Featured Online Below', '<URL>/', 'Park Taylor Studio Homes are tucked away in a lovely, well cared for community, and best of all, we are professionally managed by *Prodesse Property Group.', 'Park Taylor Apartments', 'Office Location:', '630 Taylor Court', 'Mountain View, CA, 94043', 'show contact info', 'Call or Text for more information and to book your tour.', '*We are a dedicated team of property management professionals working together to manage residential properties throughout the San Francisco Bay Area.', 'We take great pride in creating wonderful living spaces that feel like home.living spaces that feel like home.']
